import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const A1 = () => { const [comments, setComments] = useState([]); const [userPhoto, setUserPhoto] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userPhoto') || null); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userName') || 'Your Name'); useEffect(() => { // Load comments, user name, and user photo from local storage const storedComments = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('comments')) || []; const storedUserName = localStorage.getItem('userName') || 'Your Name'; const storedUserPhoto = localStorage.getItem('userPhoto') || null; setComments(storedComments); setUserName(storedUserName); setUserPhoto(storedUserPhoto); }, []); const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const comment = event.target.elements.comment.value; const newComment = { author: userName, // Use the user's name from local storage timestamp: new Date().toLocaleString(), content: comment, }; const updatedComments = [...comments, newComment]; setComments(updatedComments); event.target.reset(); // Save comments to local storage localStorage.setItem('comments', JSON.stringify(updatedComments)); }; const handlePhotoUpload = (event) => { const file = event.target.files[0]; if (file) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = (event) => { const photoObjectURL = event.target.result; setUserPhoto(photoObjectURL); localStorage.setItem('userPhotoBase64', photoObjectURL); // Store the updated user photo in local storage }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); } }; return (

Boruto: Naruto next generations

ボルト: ナルト ネクスト ジェネレーションズ

Every human inhabiting the world of Alcia is branded by a Count or a number written on their body. For Hina’s mother, her total drops to 0 and she’s pulled into the Abyss, never to be seen again. But her mother’s last words send Hina on a quest to find a legendary hero from the Waste War - the fabled Ace!
